subject: Guitar Hero II Video Tips in HD
body:
IGN Insider: Guitar Hero II Advanced Video Tips














	    IGN Insider teaches you how to play Guitar Hero II, 
	        like a real PRO!


	Watch our HD video and get the tips to score more points and start climbing the leaderboards. 

Join Insider today and get:

 • Hi-Res gameplay videos 
• Live  events coverage including E3, TGS and Leipzig
• Downloadable guides 
• Head-to-Head reviews
• Video Tips
And much more!
